job_description:
Role : Java Engineer
Location: NYC, NY Day 1 Onsite
Experience : 10+ Years

Needs to be strong in coding

Final Round IN PERSON AT CLIENT LOCATION NYC, NY

Local candidates only with DL NY/NJ only
Please share suitable profiles at Prachi.gaur@mamsys.com
ai_prompt:
You are a professional job application assistant. Based on the job description and resume provided, generate a compelling email to the recruiter.

Please provide:
1. A concise, professional subject line
2. A personalized email body that:
   - Expresses genuine interest in the position
   - Highlights relevant skills and experience from the resume that match the job description
   - Demonstrates knowledge of the role
   - Includes a clear call to action
   - Maintains a professional yet personable tone

Format your response as JSON with two fields: "subject" and "body". Subject should be Application for
email_subject: Experienced Java Engineer Interested in NYC Opportunity
email_body: Dear Prachi Gaur, I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to express my genuine interest in the Java Engineer position in NYC, NY as advertised. With over 10 years of experience in Java development, I am confident in my ability to meet the coding requirements of the role. I am excited about the opportunity to contribute my expertise to your team and help drive success in this role. I am based locally in NY with a valid NY/NJ driver's license, making me a suitable candidate for the position. I would love the chance to discuss how my skills and experience align with the needs of your client further. Please let me know if there are any additional materials or information you require from me. Thank you for considering my application. Best regards, [Your Name]

email_body:
Dear Prachi Gaur,

I am writing to express my genuine interest in the Java Engineer position based in NYC, NY as advertised. With over 10 years of experience in software development, I am confident in my ability to meet the coding requirements of the role.

Having reviewed the job description, I am particularly excited about the opportunity to contribute my expertise in Java programming to your team. My past projects have honed my coding skills, and I am eager to leverage this experience in a new and challenging environment.

I understand the importance of local presence for the final round interview and assure you that I am a local candidate with a valid driver's license from NY. I am looking forward to discussing how my background, skills, and enthusiasm align with the needs of your team.

Please find my resume attached for your review. I am available at your convenience for an interview and can be reached at +1 (940) 277-2434 or sai.charan@example.com. Thank you for considering my application.

Best regards,
Sai Charan Teratipally
+1 (940) 277-2434

email_body:
Subject: Application for Java Engineer Position

Dear Prachi Gaur,

I am reaching out regarding the Java Engineer position at your company in NYC, NY. I am excited about the opportunity to contribute my 10+ years of experience in Java development, along with my strong coding skills, to your team. Some of the skills and experiences from the job description that I possess include:

- Proficiency in Java programming
- Extensive experience in coding and software development
- Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced environment

I am confident that my background aligns well with the requirements of the role. I am eager to further discuss how my skills and experiences can benefit your team. Please find my attached resume for your review.

Best regards,
Sai Charan Teratipally
tcharan.tech@gmail.com
+1 (940) 277-2434

job_description:
Role - Java Full Stack Developer
Location - Dallas preferred. Remote is ok.

5+ years' experience in design and development of Java/J2EE applications
Working knowledge of Enterprise Java technologies (J2EE / Java EE) 
Over 5 years of application development experience
Strong technical skills in Java, J2EE, EJB, WebServices , JSP, JDBC, XML, JavaScript, HTML, CSS
Must have object-oriented programming expertise and have sound understanding of design patterns
Knowledge of AWS services is required preferable hands-on.
Familiarity with building and consuming web services
Familiar with SOAP and REST API protocols, as well as HTTP transport concepts
Practical knowledge of relational database concepts and SQL queries (DB2 and Oracle preferred)
Experience with database Stored Procedures, Triggers, Functions
Experience with WebLogic and WebSphere platforms
Experience with Linux OS desirable
Experience with assessment and refactoring of WebLogic/WebSphere applications for cloud readiness on AWS
Excellent written and oral communication skills
Knowledge of telecommunications industry helpful.
Ability to manage multiple projects concurrently
Ability to work either independently or as part of a larger team, depending on project assignments

Apply-durga@vysystems.com

email_subject: Application for Java Full Stack Developer (Dallas)
email_body:
Subject: Application for Java Full Stack Developer Position

Dear [Recruiter's Name],

I am reaching out to express my genuine interest in the Java Full Stack Developer position at your esteemed organization. With over 5 years of experience in design and development of Java/J2EE applications, I am excited about the opportunity to contribute my skills and expertise to your team.

Key skills and experiences that align with the job description include:
- Strong technical proficiency in Java, J2EE, WebServices, JavaScript, HTML, CSS
- Familiarity with building and consuming web services, SOAP, REST API protocols
- Practical knowledge of relational database concepts and SQL queries
- Experience with WebLogic and WebSphere platforms

I am confident that my background in Java development and familiarity with AWS services make me a strong candidate for this role. I am eager to leverage my skills to drive innovation and deliver high-quality solutions for your projects.

Please find my attached resume for your review. I am looking forward to the opportunity to discuss how my qualifications align with the needs of your team. Thank you for considering my application.

Best regards,
Sai Charan Teratipally
tcharan.tech@gmail.com
+1 (940) 277-2434
